description: It`s a custom variation of the Ashsaber, and was developed within the Earth Cradle. It was created using data gathered from the ATX Plan units, such as Alt Eisen, Weissritter, Wild Wuerger, and Wild Falken, in addition to using parts borrowed from the Randgrith. It`s also equipped with the GEIM System.
name: ASK-G03C Rapiecage
